entry.name: MAV_CMD_SET_VIEW_MODE
entry.param: Index of the ROI if view mode type is VIEW_MODE_TYPE_ROI. Empty otherwise.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_SET_STILL_CAPTURE_MODE
entry.param: Timelapse interval in milliseconds if still capture mode type is STILL_CAPTURE_MODE_TYPE_TIMELAPSE. Interval in centimeters between each capture if still capture mode type is STILL_CAPTURE_MODE_TYPE_GPS_POSITION. Overlapping percentage between each capture if still capture mode is STILL_CAPTURE_MODE_TYPE_AUTOMATIC_OVERLAP.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_SET_PHOTO_SENSORS
entry.description: Set the photo sensors that are/will be used.

enum.name: MAV_VIEW_MODE_TYPE
enum.description: Type of the view mode. This is how the vehicle should behave to set its orientation.

entry.name: VIEW_MODE_TYPE_ABSOLUTE
entry.description: Vehicle orientation is fixed between two waypoints. Orientation is changed when the waypoint is validated

entry.name: VIEW_MODE_TYPE_CONTINUE
entry.description: Vehicle orientation changes linearly between two waypoints.

entry.name: VIEW_MODE_TYPE_ROI
entry.description: Vehicle orientation is given by a ROI.

enum.name: MAV_STILL_CAPTURE_MODE_TYPE
enum.description: Type of still capture that is performed upon a still capture initiation.

entry.name: STILL_CAPTURE_MODE_TYPE_GPS_POSITION
entry.description: Capture according to the GPS position of the vehicle. Images are captured with an equal spacing.

entry.name: STILL_CAPTURE_MODE_TYPE_AUTOMATIC_OVERLAP
entry.description: Capture according to an overlap rate. Images captured will overlap each other by a percentage defined by the overlap rate.

enum.name: MAV_PHOTO_SENSORS_FLAG
enum.description: These flags encode the photo sensors.
